articles.title: Hims & Hers launches Wegovy knockoff pill, Novo Nordisk vows to sue
articles.description:
The announcement from Hims is the latest example of the company’s efforts to capitalize on the booming popularity of GLP-1 drugs like Wegovy, which have revolutionized weight loss treatment in the US.

The post Hims & Hers launches Wegovy knockoff pill, Novo Nordisk vows to sue appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hims & Hers launched a Wegovy knockoff pill to tap into the weight loss market.
Novo Nordisk plans to sue Hims & Hers over patent infringement issues.
Boston residents may see increased access to weight loss treatments amid legal disputes.

articles.title: GOP candidates weigh in on transgender athlete controversy raised on South Shore
articles.description:
Two candidates for governor and one for U.S. Senate voiced support for a Pembroke mom who raised concerns about transgender student-athletes in high school sports.

The post GOP candidates weigh in on transgender athlete controversy raised on South Shore appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: GOP candidates support Pembroke mom's concerns about transgender athletes in high school sports.
Candidates include two gubernatorial hopefuls and one U.S. Senate candidate addressing the issue.
The controversy may influence local policies on transgender participation in school athletics.

articles.title: Savannah Guthrie’s missing mother is ‘still out there,’ sheriff says, but no suspects
articles.description:
Five days into the desperate search for 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie, authorities have not identified any suspects or persons of interest, Pima County Sheriff Chris Nanos said.

The post Savannah Guthrie’s missing mother is ‘still out there,’ sheriff says, but no suspects appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Authorities continue search for 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie, missing for five days.
Pima County Sheriff Chris Nanos reports no suspects or persons of interest identified.
Boston residents concerned as search efforts highlight ongoing issues with elder safety.

articles.title: Mayor Wu announces new efforts to restrict ICE in Boston
articles.description:
Boston is banning ICE from using city property, and local police are being told to investigate federal agents that break city or state laws.

The post Mayor Wu announces new efforts to restrict ICE in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mayor Wu bans ICE from using city property in Boston.
Local police will investigate federal agents violating city or state laws.
This policy aims to protect immigrant communities in Boston.

summary: Engage with a Maye-inspired crossword and playlist celebrating Drake's music.

Enhance community connection through music-themed activities in Boston.

articles.title: Robert Spillane: Tom Brady’s neutral Super Bowl pick ‘makes me sick’
articles.description:
"He has a dog in the fight."

The post Robert Spillane: Tom Brady’s neutral Super Bowl pick ‘makes me sick’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Robert Spillane criticizes Tom Brady's neutral Super Bowl pick ahead of Super Bowl LX.
Spillane expresses disappointment, stating Brady has a vested interest in the game.
Local fans react, highlighting the ongoing rivalry and emotional ties to the Patriots.
